name: JavaScript Rock-Paper-Scissors
description:
THE ULTIMATE ROCK PAPER SCISSORS EXPERIENCE!

...kind of...

Experience a simplistic and literally never-ending game of Rock, Paper, Scissors! Choose your weapon, and the A.I. will choose theirs. Now, just wait to see what they choose... and if you win, you get a point! As easy as pie! The A.I. is completely random, so there is no cheesing going on here.
